name: INPHO: Advance Course on SHM & Waves
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will provide in-depth knowledge of SHM & Waves. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for IIT JEE. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Simple Harmonic Motion (SHM): Periodic Motion
SHM: U-x Graph, Types of Methods & Problem Solving
SHM: Spring with Mass and One Round Oscillation to Length of Spring
SHM: Shifted Mean Position, Simple Pendulum, and Uniform Ring
SHM: Circular Motion Projection and Elastic Ring in Electric Field
SHM: Physical Pendulum, Charged Ring, and Spring Elastic Cord
SHM: Pendulum Oscillations, Spring Mass System, and Ring
SHM: Mechanical Oscillation and Disc Oscillations
SHM: Mechanical Oscillations and Problem Solving
SHM: Elliptical Plate, Triangle Plate, and Particle in a Bowl
SHM: Waves & its Types
Waves: Transverse Waves, Wave Speed, and Tension Variations
Energy of Transverse Waves and Potential Energy of Waves in Solid
Power and Intensity of Travelling Waves, Sound Waves, and Density Waves
Sound Waves: Effects of Pressure, Temperature, and Humidity
Reflection of Waves, Wave Equation on Transmission, and Reflection
Superposition of Waves - I
Standing Waves: Shape of String on Superposition
Energy in Standing Waves, Vibration of Strings, and Vibration of Beam
Superposition of Waves - III
Modes of Vibration and Energy in Standing Waves
Superposition of Waves, Beats, and Doppler Effect
Mega quiz
Doppler Effect: Problem Solving
